definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
holocene/period since the last ice age
holocene system (geological strata laid down during the last 12000 years)

sentences.english: All laptops in our shop are brand new and authentic.
sentences.chinese: 本店所售筆記本電腦均爲全新正品行貨。

sentences.english: Modernism provided the foundations for a genuinely new culture.
sentences.chinese: 現代主義爲一種全新的文化奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: Cameron has supervised the creation of a new high-definition transfer for the DVD.
sentences.chinese: 喀麥隆指導了這部DVD的全新高清晰數碼轉換。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑門帶你到後院的舒適游泳池，還有果樹。

sentences.english: The theory provided a new way to fabricate ultra-narrow optical filters.
sentences.chinese: 這將爲設計一種全新的濾波器提供指導。

sentences.english: Then I could fly to a new world to lead a whole-new life!
sentences.chinese: 可以飛往一個新的境界，過一種全新的生活啊。

sentences.english: Electronic party affairs are a new method to strengthen the party construction in colleges in the new era.
sentences.chinese: 電子黨務是新時期加強高校黨建的全新載體。

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 這裏還有全新的洗衣機，浴缸，跑步機和電視機。

sentences.english: The Network Multimedia CAI Courseware provides a bran - new teaching mode.
sentences.chinese: 網絡多媒體CAI課件提供了一種全新的教學模式。

sentences.english: Mannings opened a brand new flagship store in the Elements Mall of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 萬寧在香港“圓方”商場開設全新形象店。

sentences.english: It’s safe to say that lucid dreams are unlike anything else you’ve ever experienced.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定地說，清醒夢會給你帶來全新的體驗。

sentences.english: This article has a brief review on Holocene climate changes in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 簡要地回顧了蒙古全新世氣候變化研究。

sentences.english: The Singularity isn't a wholly new idea, just newish.
sentences.chinese: 奇點並非是什麼全新理念，它只是比較新穎而已。

sentences.english: By doing so you will open a whole new vista for your life.
sentences.chinese: 這可一使你對生活有一個全新的展望。

sentences.english: It will deliver innovative new features while focusing on application and device compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 它將帶給大家全新的兼容性更強的新功能。

sentences.english: Being an entirely new and unabridged edition.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個全新的，未刪節版。

definition: to confess one's crime/first model, version, kind etc (of gadgets, software, cars etc)
to push out/to release/to launch/to publish/to recommend
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
to escalate (in intensity)/to go up by one grade/to be promoted/to upgrade (computing)
to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to put effort into (work, farming, writing etc)/a masterpiece
to draw into/to pull into/to introduce
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
